EmailTemplate.description: Send FLC Submission email on Renewal
EmailTemplate.name: Registration FLC Submission Email
EmailTemplate.subject: FLC License Submitted Successfully
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
For: {!License_Registration__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c} Application ID: {!License_Registration__c.License_Registration_Number__c}
You have now submitted your application for a Farm Labor Contractor License.
Once your submission is processed, you will be notified of approval via e-mail or defect with an attached explanation of the outstanding issues.
If you wish to print a copy of your submission for your records, you may do so by logging into the registration site, and click on the "Email a Copy" link on the left.
IMPORTANT: Successful completion of the examination does not authorize you to operate as a Farm Labor Contractor. It is illegal to operate as a Farm Labor Contractor business without first obtaining a Farm Labor Contractor License from the State Labor Commissioner's Office. If you operate without a valid license, you will be subject to civil or criminal penalties.
Thank you,
Licensing & Registration Unit
